api.title: Oops, something went wrong.
api.detail: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

scoring.title: Oops, something went wrong.
scoring.detail: Unfortunately, we are unable to continue in the app. We will be happy to help you at one of our branches - please remember to bring a valid ID.

precontractDisagree.title: We can't continue without your consent
precontractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from your new current account. In order to open it, we need your consent to pre-contractual information and contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

contractDisagree.title: We can't continue without your consent
contractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from your new current account. In order to open it, we need your consent to pre-contractual information and contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

introDisagree.title: Ke Smart Bance neodmyslitelně patří Tom Plus účet
introDisagree.detail: Ten je úplně zdarma a bez podmínek. Teprve s ním využijete aplikaci naplno - třeba výhodnou směnárnu, pojištění na pár kliků nebo jednoduché investování.
introDisagree.primaryButton: Zpět k získání účtu zcela zdarma

disagreement.title: We can't continue without your consent
disagreement.detail: You are just a step away from your new current account. In order to open it, we need your consent to pre-contractual information and contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

general.supportChat: Open a current account just like you would in our branch – click here and our banker will assist you online.

intro.title: Open a current account in Smart Banka free of charge.
intro.detail: An account that is free of charge and without complicated terms and conditions

richBullets.text: To open and manage your account

richBullets.info:
Instant payments are processed within seconds.
If the recipient supports the feature.
We are ready.

infoScreen.title: Favorable savings
infoScreen.detail:
Open a savings account in Smart Banka. Open and manage it free-of-charge, and access your finances anytime.

In your savings account, you can set up different envelopes and enjoy seeing yourself get closer to your dreams. Just name the envelope, set a savings goal, and start saving.

infoScreen.title: Simple investments
infoScreen.detail:
Investments start as low as a couple hundred Crowns. Smart Banka makes it easy. We will walk you through the purchase and sale and tell you how to keep track of your investments.

Even the most experienced investors will appreciate our new and improved profotilo management.

infoScreen.title: The great exchange rates
infoScreen.detail: Exchange Czech Crowns for Euros or US Dollars. Every business day from 8 am to 4 pm you can get one of the best exchange rates on the market. The exchange is instantaneous, free-of-charge and hassle-free. How does it work? With your first exchange, we will open an account in the selected currency (EUR/USD) for you free-of-charge, and we will credit the exchanged amount into the account. Account management is free-of-charge and you can close the account at any time. For you comfort, you also receive a payment card free-of-charge.

infoScreen.title: Apply for loans and credit cards online
infoScreen.detail:
Apply for Express Loan and receive up to 500,000 CZK in Smart Banka. The process only takes a couple of minutes and you receive the amount within 5 minutes of approval.

You can also apply for a Smart Credit Card in Smart Banka. Receive 1% of you spending in your most-frequented stores. You can start paying using your phone via Apple Pay or Google Pay as soon as the following day.

footnote.title: In order to proceed online you need:
detail: to be 18 years of age or older,
to be a resident as well as a tax resident solely of the Czech Republic,
your ID card and another from of ID (driver’s license or passport),
an account opened in your name in a Czech bank and
to take a quick selfie during the application process.

introEtb.title: Open a Tom Plus Account free of charge.
introEtb.detail: An account that is free of charge and without complicated terms and conditions

helpPersonalDetail.title: Verify your personal details
helpPersonalDetail.detail: Even though we know your personal details we need to verify. If there have been any changes you will need your ID to verify them. You can just take a photo of it right within the app. The process is secure. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

helpUploadDocument.title: You need to have a valid ID to continue
helpUploadDocument.detail: Due to some changes in your personal details we need you to verify them with your ID. You can take a photo of it within the app. The process is secure and take just a while. DO you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

identification.title: Your details
identification.taxResidenceInfoBody: We kindly ask for information in order to meet a common standard for due diligence in the area of information on financial accounts for the purpose of exchanging information provided by financial institutions to tax administrations under the Multilateral Agreement of the competent authorities on the automatic exchange of information on financial accounts (in this case current accounts and term deposits).

contactAddress.title: Do we have your contact address correct?

cardOptions.title: Virtual card in mobile phone
cardOptions.detail: We issue a virtual card instead of a plastic card. For payments and withdrawals, you just need to add it to your mobile right after setting up an account.

cardOptions.title: Plastic card
cardOptions.detail: The plastic card you know well. You can also add it to your mobile phone.

addressSection.title: Contact address
addressSection.info: We will send your debit card to the contact address.

contactAddress.virtualCardCheckbox:
A mobile phone card is enough
Instead of a plastic card, we will issue you a virtual one. For payments and withdrawals from ATMs, you add it to your mobile right after opening an account. You will then find the data for paying on the Internet in your Smart Bank and Internet Bank.

cardDesign.title: Choose the design of your new card

amlQuestionnaire.title: Legally required information
amlQuestionnaire.detail: We are legally obligated to ask for this information under Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on money laundering.

depositOrigin.text: Where will the money in the current account mostly come from?

options.text: From family and friends / Winnings / Presents

prevailingTransactions.text: What kind of transactions will most likely take place?

options.text: Foreign cashless outside of the EU

rangeOfSalary.text: What will be the amount of monthly income in the current account?

amlQuestionnaire.taxResidenceInfoBody: We kindly ask for information in order to meet a common standard for due diligence in the area of information on financial accounts for the purpose of exchanging information provided by financial institutions to tax administrations under the Multilateral Agreement of the competent authorities on the automatic exchange of information on financial accounts (in this case current accounts and term deposits).

documentUpload.title: We need your current ID. Please upload it.
documentUpload.detail: As some of your details may have changed, we need your ID to verify them. All we need a legible clear photo. You can upload it in the app or visit our branch. The photo upload process is secure.

uploadedDocument.title: Please take a photo of both sides of your ID.

documentUploadRetry.title: Oops, something's wrong
documentUploadRetry.detail: We couldn't read your details. Please make sure the photo is well lit and the text are legible.

scoring.title: Just a moment, the cat needs the look things over

staticDocuments.title: Read all the important contractual documents
staticDocuments.subtitle: All documents can be found in Smart Banka in the My Documents section.
staticDocuments.primaryButton: I have read all the documents

waitingBeforePrecontract.title: Just a minute, we're preparing the pre-contractual information.

waitingBeforeContract.title: Just a moment, we're preparing the contract

contract.title: Please read the Current Account Contract

disagreement.title: We can't continue without your consent
disagreement.detail: You are just a step away from your new current account. In order to open it, we need your consent to pre-contractual information and contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

sign.title: Sign the contract with your PIN

signByUs.title: Now it's our turn to sign... just a moment please.

victory.title: Congratulations!
victory.detail:
Your current account has been opened. If you have requested a physical card it will be delivered to you by mail within 5 business days.

All documents can be found in the My Documents sections in Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

tomorrowVictory.title: Your current account will be ready the morning of the following business day.
tomorrowVictory.detail: All documents can be found in the My Documents sections in Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

delayedVictory.title: We're almost done. It might take a while for us to sign the contract.
delayedVictory.detail: it might take some time for us to sign the contract - during business days it's usually a couple of hours, but during weekend it might take until Monday. Your account will be ready immediately after. All your documents are already in the My Documents section of Internet Banka and Smart Banka. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.

simpleDocumentUpload.title: Oops, we need your current ID
simpleDocumentUpload.detail: It appears that the ID you provided us earlier is no longer current. Please upload a new one.

141.title: ID
141.detail: Some information has changed since your last visit

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the front of your ID card
photoCapture.detail: Valid document, in good lighting, sharp and not blurred.

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the back of your ID card
photoCapture.detail: Valid document, in good lighting, sharp and not blurred.

busyLoader.title: Be patient for a moment, we have to check everything
busyLoader.detail: It will take a few seconds at most.

uploadDocumentResultNok.title: We cannot open a foreign currency account for you right now

uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.title: Oops, this didn't work
uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.detail: Please take a photo of the document again, in good lighting, sharp and not blurry.

review.title: Great photo! Did we read everything correctly?

personalData.title: We will verify the data provided by you in the basic registers. More about their operation on the website Administration of basic registers and Moneta Money Bank By pressing Continue, you confirm that all information provided is true, complete, correct and up-to-date.

simpleDocumentUpload.secondaryButton: I will provide the documents later
